message: Let's make a deal. I take $70, you take $30. It's a good offer for you considering the inflation.
Alice, your offer was a bit unfair. Let's be reasonable, I'll take $60 and you get $40. This accounts for the inflation impact on my end.
Bob, let's be practical. I'll take $60, you take $40.  Every round costs us money due to the inflation.  It's time to settle.
